main.name: Nicholas Ryan
main.bio: Specializing in C#/.NET and Full-Stack JavaScript, possessing experience in web & software development from Code Fellows, as well as data science with Python and Matlab from obtaining a degree in Geology from the University of Oregon. Passionate about creating efficient and powerful code to address a litany of modern problems.

education.degree: Advanced Software Development in ASP.NET Core
education.description: Concepts learned: C# Fundamentals, Unit Testing, RESTful APIs, ASP.NET Core development, Git/GitHub, Data Structures & Algorithms, etc.
Relevant coursework (courses that used Python): Introduction to Programming and Problem Solving, Earth and Environmental Data Analysis, MATLAB for Earth Sciences, Introductory GIScience, Hydrogeology

work.title: Tutor & Teaching Assistant
work.description: Assist students with questions related to course work in C#, Python and JavaScript. Consistently regarded by students as one of the most helpful and insightful TAs on staff.

work.title: Line & Prep Cook
work.description: Cultivated a much healthier work environment throughout employment by leading weekly team meetings which improved productivity and teamwork as well as mediating interpersonal conflicts between staff directly.

work.title: Research Assistant - Earth Sciences
work.description: Worked one on one with grad students to ensure that all of their projects were completed on time. Duties including debugging and optimizing Python code and preparing samples for testing.

projects.title: FINDnD
projects.category: Xamarin.Forms mobile app for finding groups of people to play DnD with.

projects.title: Flummery Flummeries
projects.category: Model E-Commerce website selling Flummery desserts with a compliment.

projects.title: Interview Prep App
projects.category: Website for preparing for coding interviews.

projects.title: Deskhub
projects.category: Website used to compile daily news and information in one site.

projects.title: Beast League
projects.category: Pokemon-like web game created in one week.

testimonials.text: Nicholas was an outstanding team member. He really took on the role of a teacher's assistant from the very beginning all the way back in April/May til the time we graduate in September. He vast array of knowledge, experience and ability to learn something new was well beyond just a student. He also is very creative and comes up with unique amazing ideas on projects and how to approach problems that left some of us in awe. I would recommend Nicholas anytime any day as a Software Engineer whether its ASP.NET Core, Javascript or Python.
